forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 17C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. High 63F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain later in the day. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. High 13C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 56F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly cloudy. Low 6C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 43F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early then partly cloudy and windy later in the day. High 12C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early then partly cloudy and windy later in the day. High 54F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Gusty winds diminishing after midnight. Low near 5C. Winds NW at 30 to 50 km/h. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear. Gusty winds diminishing after midnight. Low near 40F. Winds NW at 20 to 30 mph. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 14C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low around 5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near 40F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 43F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 8C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine in the morning giving way to clouds and a few showers during the afternoon. High 18C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
